data.name: Accounting+ Soundtrack (Yellow Edition)
data.detailed_description:
Original music composed and produced by Tom Schley (Silkersoft) – and hasn't he done well? A collection of songs, hymns, and soulful laments inspired by the dystopian landscape of Accounting+. Some tracks are good, some tracks are bad, all tracks are excellent. Thank you for listening.

Tracklist:

01. Accounting
02. Tree World
03. Tree Guy's Theme
04. Cool Gang O.S.T.
05. Do It
06. The King is Dead
07. Better Times (Flute Guy Live at Flutefest 2X43 Very Rare Recording)
08. Play Those Bones
09. Acid (Get It)
10. Can't Come Through Here
11. Warzorth's Domain
12. 666 (Ritual Rap)
13. 667 (Ritual Rap II)
14. All Your Friends Are Dead
15. Lifebringer
16. Guilty
17. Look What You Did
18. Worm Headset Interlude
19. 305 °F
20. You Did Accounting
21. Save The Animals
22. Thank You, Please
23. Aquarius
24. Crunch The Numbers
25. June
26. Danger in Sector 3
27. Romance in Sector 3
28. Mission Complete in Sector 3
29. 350 °F (BATLORD Remix)

data.short_description: Original music composed and produced by Tom Schley (Silkersoft) – and hasn't he done well? A collection of songs, hymns, and soulful laments inspired by the dystopian landscape of Accounting+. Some tracks are good, some tracks are bad, all tracks are excellent. Thank you for listening.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: A good one
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NO! It's music.
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Anything that plays music should be just fine, I hope...
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 666
  • Processor: The best one
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Don't even worry about it
  • Storage: 667 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: You could even listen with headphones!
